titles.title: MP553 Peace I give to you

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Peace I give to you,
I give to you my peace.
Peace I give to you,
I give to you my peace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Love I give to you,
I give to you my love.
Love I give to you,
I give to you my love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hope I give to you,
I give to you my hope.
Hope I give to you,
I give to you my hope.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Joy I give to you,
I give to you my joy.
Joy I give to you,
I give to you my joy.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Grace I give to you,
I give to you my grace.
Grace I give to you,
I give to you my grace.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Power I give to you,
I give to you my power.
Power I give to you,
I give to you my power.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let it flow to one another,
Let it flow, let it flow.
Let it flow to one another,
Let it flow, let it flow.
